content: easy peazy shawl megan@delormedesigns ca delorme designs www delormedesigns blogspot com easy peazy shawl lace pattern row 1 k2 yo * k2tog yo * repeat *to* until 1 st dimensions approx- 28 x 51 before m k1 yo sm k1 sm yo k1 * yo ssk * repeat *to* until last 2sts yo k2 materials row 2 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 slip markers berroco ultra alpaca 100g- 3 skeins repeat row 1&2 of lace 2 more times for a total 50% alpaca/50% wool of 3 repeats 6 row worked 215yds/198m size 4mm/6 32 circ needle continue as follows colour #6285 stockinette patt 4 repeats of row 1 &2 8 row markers if using lace patt 3 repeats of row 1&2 6 row gauge not important for this project note project is knit from neck edge down stockinette patt 4 repeats of row 1&2 8 row lace patt 3 repeats of row 1&2 6 row stockinette patt 4 repeats of row 1&2 8 row cast on 5 sts lace patt 3 repeats of row 1 &2 6 row set up row rs k2 yo pm k1 pm stockinette patt 4 repeats of row 1&2 8 row yo k2 lace patt 3 repeats of row 1&2 6 row set up row ws k2 purl to last 2 sts stockinette patt 6 repeats of row 1&2 12 row k2 slip markers lace pattern 5 repeats of row 1&2 10 row stockinette pattern stockinette patt 6 repeats of row 1&2 12 row row 1 k2 yo k to marker yo sm k1 sm lace patt 5 repeats of row 1&2 10 row yo knit to last 2 sts yo k2 stockinette patt 6 repeats of row 1&2 12 row row 2 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 slip markers lace patt 5 repeats of row 1&2 10 row repeat row 1 & 2 2 more times for a stockinette patt 6 repeats of row 1&2 12 row total of 4repeats 8 row worked incl set up lace patt 7 repeats of row 1&2 14 row row bind off weave in ends block shawl next lace pattern megan@delormedesigns ca www delormedesigns blogspot com delorme designs note ssk- there are many ways to achieve ssk i have presented a way that i discovered makes the stitch lay flatter thanks knittinghelp com this shawl has to be blocked in order for the lace to really open up markers can be used or not since i was able to distinguish the center stitch i was able to knit without markers newer knitters however should use markers a circular needle was used to accommodate the large number of stitches that are used do not join in the round work is knit flat slip markers as needed 51 abbreviations 28 k-knit bobble- bind off p-purl pm- place marker sts- stitches yo-yarn over sm- slip marker m-marker k2tog- knit 2 stitches together ssk- slip 1st stitch knitwise on left needle to right needle slip 2nd stitch purlwise
